decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site location plan; A100 (Existing ground floor plan); A101 (Existing first floor plan); A105 Rev. A (Existing front and rear elevations); A110 (Proposed ground floor plan); A111 (Proposed first floor plan); A115 Rev. A (Proposed front, rear and side elevations); A200 (Block plan); Planning Statement (Revisions received 04.02.2022)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings/plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), the Mill Hill Park Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Plan (2007), policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension or rear outrigger shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 7.B of the Development Management, Development Plan Document (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policy D4 of the London Plan (2021); and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
description: Single storey rear extension; alterations to existing side infill extension including raising roof and eaves height
